name: Exemption
text: §441-22.1  Exemption.  The director shall exempt any cemetery authority from the bonding requirement and the fee requirements for license, renewal and reinstatement upon proof satisfactory to the director that it does not sell for financial profit. [L 1968, c 14, §3; am L 1981, c 221, §8; am L 1985, c 101, §5]
